---
title: "Task 10: Modelling intervention impact"
---

## Overview

This task covers modelling the impact of interventions. You will learn how to estimate and compare the effects of different public health interventions on disease transmission.

## Learning Objectives

- Model intervention effects on transmission
- Compare different intervention strategies
- Quantify intervention effectiveness
- Design optimal intervention strategies
